front.title: Real-time Transport Control Protocol Extension Report for Run Length Encoding of Discarded Packets

abstract.t: The Real-time Transport Control Protocol (RTCP) is used inconjunction with the Real-time Transport Protocol (RTP) in to providea variety of short-term and long-term reception statistics. Theavailable reporting may include aggregate information across longerperiods of time as well as individual packet reporting. Thisdocument specifies a per-packet report metric capturing individualpackets discarded from the jitter buffer after successful reception.
